description: The sixth brother of the de Burgh family, Reynold, is determined to leave the Campion castle. Seeing all his brothers get married one after another is growing painful. He knows it is impossible for him to be happy like them. The ones who come to see him off are the L'Estrange sisters, who are rumored to be witches. Their prophecy states, "Reynold will slay the dragon and then save the damsel in distress." While he thinks the statement is ridiculous, the village he reaches happens to have a dragon that protects a treasure, and the beautiful daughter of the manor, Sabina, has started looking for help!
name: Vol. 1

volume.name: Reynold De Burgh: The Dark Knight

description: In the middle of a journey, Reynold de Burgh, a knight, happens upon a village that's being attacked by a dragon. When the head woman of the village, Lady Sabina, begs him to help, he swears on his honor to exterminate the dragon. But is the real danger to Sabina the earnest knight himself, who sets her heart aflame? She can't allow herself to be drawn to him... He's a wolf much more dangerous than the dragon. After all, at some point he must leave and marry a woman suitable to the nobility. And what of the dragon, whose cries they hear and whose fiery breath they can see, but whose true form is a mystery? Will the dragon ever show its face to them...?
name: Vol. 2

volume.name: Reynold De Burgh: The Dark Knight

description: Meet Christian Savage, vampire hunter in the wildest backlands of the old Wild West. Abandoned by his parents at birth and raised by a kindly priest, Savage was momentarily lured to the black arts of the occult and it cost him the life of the priest. Now Savage roams the countryside ridding the frontier of the supernatural enemies of civilization, attempting to make the Wild West safe for homesteaders, until his mission brings him to the last two people on Earth he never expected to meet.
name: Guns and Crosses

description: Christian Savage is on the run and must defend and fight off a pack of demon wolves hot on his trail. As he barely escapes with his life and hovers near death we flashback and learn the early history of Savage and Father O'Toole.
name: Sign of the Cross

description: Savage comes across the last two people on Earth he would ever expect. His parents. Two beings that have set themselves up in a secluded castle, with their bloodsucking minions, overlooking the very fiery pit of Hell itself. And here they will tempt and seduce Savage once more with the black arts of the occult in a bid to join them.
name: Vampire Love

description: The exciting conclusion to the Savage story arc. Christian Savage challenges his bloodthirsty overlord father to a winner take all duel with the stakes being none higher than that of Savage's life and very soul.
name: Fire in the Night

volume.name: Kirby Shoes Comics Featuring Kirby the Golden Bear "Diner for Dinner"

name: Volume One: From the Beginning through July 20th 1946

description: Daily and Sunday Strips, March 21, 1938 to September 18, 1938
name: Head-to-Head with the Head!
